task.title: Enabling Termed Subscriptions
task.abstract: Termed subscriptions are activated when the Direct Debit agreement is submitted and extends the identified term.

step.cmd: Navigate to the eStore app and click the Subscription Plans tab. Click New.
Select Termed from the Type picklist.
Check the Is Direct Debit Enabled checkbox.
Set Invoice Days Variable (days). The system automatically creates a Sales Order that mirrors the current active subscription "X" number of days prior to subscription expiration.

If the subscription is to set up to auto-renew, the direct debit agreement will be extended to the end of the new term:Select “Required” from the Auto Renewed picklist. The system updates the amount of each payment and extend the term of the agreement to match the renewal period.
Check Require Payment Method Note: Non-Direct Debit Enabled Subscription Plans require a Payment Gateway assignment when Auto-Renew enabled.
Leave Number of Installments (blank), Bill Cycle: AUTO and Bill Cycle Day: (blank)
Select “Automatic Payment” from Schedule Type picklist
Select the desired frequency from Schedule Frequency picklist (e.g. Annually, Quarterly, Monthly) Note: The direct debit payment processor only supports: Annually, Quarterly, and Monthly.
